sources.title: War of the Satellites
sources.description: Title: War of the Satellites Summary: An "unknown force" declares war against planet Earth when the United Nations disobeys warnings to cease and desist in its attempts at assembling the first satellite in the atmosphere. Directed by: Roger Corman Actors: Dick Miller, Susan Cabot, Richard Devon Production Company: Allied Artists Pictures Release Date: 18 May 1958 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 An "unknown force" declares war against planet Earth when the United Nations disobeys warnings to cease and desist in its attempts at assembling the first satellite in the atmosphere.

metadata.Plot: An "unknown force" declares war against planet Earth when the United Nations disobeys warnings to cease and desist in its attempts at assembling the first satellite in the atmosphere.
metadata.Writer: Irving Block, Lawrence L. Goldman, Jack Rabin
metadata.Actors: Dick Miller, Susan Cabot, Richard Devon
